casebody.data:
No. 10-545. Lawrence Golan, et al., Petitioners v. Eric H. Holder, Jr., Attorney General, et al. 562 U.S. 1270, 131 S. Ct. 1600,

179 L. Ed. 2d 516,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1972. March 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 609 F.3d 1076.
